import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AuthServiceService} from "../services/auth-service.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { constructor(private auth:AuthServiceService ) { } isAuthenticated(){ console.log("isAuthenticated"); return this.auth.isAuthenticated(); } doLogout(){ console.log("click"); this.auth.logout(); } }
